description:
Merchant Taylors' Almshouses. 
The history of this place, the preservation process, and the meticulous restoration of the building.

factsheet.heading: Genius loci. The history of preservation
paragraphs:
We are pleased to invite you to a rare tour of MERCHANT TAYLORS' ALMSHOUSES - a unique residential complex usually closed to visitors. This historic site has recently undergone careful restoration. You will see how architecture spanning two centuries remains relevant and appealing to residents to this day.
This is an opportunity to witness how thoughtful renovation preserves heritage while ensuring modern comfort.
The tour will be led by an architect Tamara Muradova @archiproba_studios and resident of the building.

location.address: 29 Merchant Taylors Almshouses, Brandram Road, SE13 5RX

name: Merchant Taylors' Almshouses
